question: What is the official currency of the Commonwealth of Dominica?
explanation: East Caribbean Dollar is the official currency of the Commonwealth of Dominica. East Caribbean Dollar is the official currency of all seven full members and one associate member of the Organisation of the Eastern Caribbean States such as Antigua and Barbuda, Anguilla, Dominica, Grenada, Montserrat, Saint Kitts and Nevis, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. This currency is issued by the Eastern Caribbean Central Bank.
